live_updates: Services in the area have been restored.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We are working to restore services. We estimate your service will be restored by 5:00pm, Please stay tuned for updates.
36233.summary: Some customers in the Montcalm area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36233.title: Apr 13 – Winnipeg (Montcalm) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate your service will be restored by 2:45pm, Please stay tuned for updates.
36232.summary: Some customers in De Winton & Surrounding areas are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
36232.title: Apr 13 – De Winton & Surrounding Areas | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
